name: MashCube
description:
MashCube is a challenging, platform adventure game created by Gil Benjamin.
The game combines fast thinking and movement
While Defensively from enemies And cannons.
Use portals to get quickly to other places, collect coins, open gates and don't give up until you finish the 10 stages.

  

How To Play

Move

Left/Right (Arrows)

Jump

Space

Shoot

'X'  /  'Z'
